overview: There once was a kind mother. She spent time with her daughter and was pretty and stylish. The best mother Nozomi could have... she was not. She was drowning in debt, out all night and neglected her daughter. Nozomi always imagined a kind mother. One day, a loan shark came to collect. To repay in full, Nozomi must scratch 100,000-yen worth of scratch-its. To regain the happy days with her mother, Nozomi must scratch no matter what.
title: Nozomi
